TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewDataErrorContexts extends System.Enum

summary.span: Represents the state of a data-bound control when a data error occurred.

span.span: Represents the state of a data-bound control when a data error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 데이터 바인딩 상태를 나타내는 비트 OR 연산을 사용 하 여이 열거형의 멤버를 결합할 수 있습니다 데이터 오류가 발생 합니다.Members of this enumeration may be combined using the bitwise OR operation to represent the state of a data-bound when a data error occurred. 예를 들어, 사용자가을 잘못 된 셀 값 (예: 날짜 셀에 이름을 입력)을 입력 한 다음 다른 셀을 선택는 잘못 된 셀 값을 적용 하려고 합니다.For example, if a user enters an invalid cell value (such as entering a name in a cell that expects a date) and then selects a different cell, the will try to commit the invalid cell value. 커밋이 실패 하면는 시킵니다는 이벤트 인 속성 값이 커밋 및 CurrentCellChange를 갖게 됩니다.When the commit fails, the will raise a event whose property will have a value of Commit and CurrentCellChange. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는 이러한 종류의 사용을 보여 줍니다.The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 이 예제는에서 사용할 수 있는 보다 큰 예제의 일부 [하는 방법: 처리 오류는 발생 하는 동안 데이터 입력 Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤에서](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/handle-errors-that-occur-during-data-entry-in-the-datagrid.md)합니다.This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Handle Errors That Occur During Data Entry in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/handle-errors-that-occur-during-data-entry-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError/CS/errorhandling.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError/VB/errorhandling.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts ClipboardContent = int32(16384)

summary.span: A data error occurred when copying content to the Clipboard.

span.span: A data error occurred when copying content to the Clipboard.

summary.span: This value indicates that the cell value could not be converted to a string.

span.span: This value indicates that the cell value could not be converted to a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts Commit = int32(512)

summary.span: A data error occurred when committing changes to the data store.

span.span: A data error occurred when committing changes to the data store.

summary.span: This value indicates that data entered in a cell could not be committed to the underlying data store.

span.span: This value indicates that data entered in a cell could not be committed to the underlying data store.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts CurrentCellChange = int32(4096)

summary.span: A data error occurred when the selection cursor moved to another cell.

span.span: A data error occurred when the selection cursor moved to another cell.

summary.span: This value indicates that a user selected a cell when the previously selected cell had an error condition.

span.span: This value indicates that a user selected a cell when the previously selected cell had an error condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts Display = int32(2)

summary.span: A data error occurred when displaying a cell that was populated by a data source.

span.span: A data error occurred when displaying a cell that was populated by a data source.

summary.span: This value indicates that the value from the data source cannot be displayed by the cell, or a mapping that translates the value from the data source to the cell is missing.

span.span: This value indicates that the value from the data source cannot be displayed by the cell, or a mapping that translates the value from the data source to the cell is missing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts Formatting = int32(1)

summary.span: A data error occurred when trying to format data that is either being sent to a data store, or being loaded from a data store.

span.span: A data error occurred when trying to format data that is either being sent to a data store, or being loaded from a data store.

summary.span: This value indicates that a change to a cell failed to format correctly.

span.span: This value indicates that a change to a cell failed to format correctly.

summary.span: Either the new cell value needs to be corrected or the cell's formatting needs to change.

span.span: Either the new cell value needs to be corrected or the cell's formatting needs to change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts InitialValueRestoration = int32(1024)

summary.span: A data error occurred when restoring a cell to its previous value.

span.span: A data error occurred when restoring a cell to its previous value.

summary.span: This value indicates that a cell tried to cancel an edit and the rollback to the initial value failed.

span.span: This value indicates that a cell tried to cancel an edit and the rollback to the initial value failed.

summary.span: This can occur if the cell formatting changed so that it is incompatible with the initial value.

span.span: This can occur if the cell formatting changed so that it is incompatible with the initial value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts LeaveControl = int32(2048)

summary.span: A data error occurred when the lost focus.

span.span: A data error occurred when the lost focus.

summary.span: This value indicates that the could not commit user changes after losing focus.

span.span: This value indicates that the could not commit user changes after losing focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts Parsing = int32(256)

summary.span: A data error occurred when parsing new data.

span.span: A data error occurred when parsing new data.

summary.span: This value indicates that the could not parse new data that was entered by the user or loaded from the underlying data store.

span.span: This value indicates that the could not parse new data that was entered by the user or loaded from the underlying data store.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts PreferredSize = int32(4)

summary.span: A data error occurred when calculating the preferred size of a cell.

span.span: A data error occurred when calculating the preferred size of a cell.

summary.span: This value indicates that the failed to calculate the preferred width or height of a cell when programmatically resizing a column or row.

span.span: This value indicates that the failed to calculate the preferred width or height of a cell when programmatically resizing a column or row.

summary.span: This can occur if the cell failed to format its value.

span.span: This can occur if the cell failed to format its value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts RowDeletion = int32(8)

summary.span: A data error occurred when deleting a row.

span.span: A data error occurred when deleting a row.

summary.span: This value indicates that the underlying data store threw an exception when a data-bound deleted a row.

span.span: This value indicates that the underlying data store threw an exception when a data-bound deleted a row.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts Scroll = int32(8192)

summary.span: A data error occurred when scrolling a new region into view.

span.span: A data error occurred when scrolling a new region into view.

summary.span: This value indicates that a cell with data errors scrolled into view programmatically or with the scroll bar.

span.span: This value indicates that a cell with data errors scrolled into view programmatically or with the scroll bar.
